securing_opened_door.description: Secure the opened door by swinging it to its closed position.

close_door.description: Swing the door to its closed position.

shut_door.description: Shut the rotation door by swinging it on its hinge to the closed position.

secure_door.description: Secure the door by swinging it on its hinge to a closed position.

unlatching_door.description: Unlatch the closed door by swinging it to its open position.

secured_door.description: The door remains secure in its closed position.

open_door.description: Swing the door to its open position.

unlock_door.description: Open the rotation door by swinging it on its hinge.

access_safe.description: Access the safe by opening the door in a rotating manner.

maintain_door_closed.description: Maintain the door in its closed position.

manipulate_knob.description: Manipulate the knob in its continuous joint.

disinfect_whole_safe.description: Disinfect the entire safe including body, door, button, and knob.

routine_maintenance.description: Routine maintenance involves opening the safe, twisting the knob, pressing the button, and closing the safe.

polish_safe_body.description: Polish the safe body to maintain its look.

clean_button.description: Clean the button for good tactile feedback.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob for smooth operation.

clean_entire_safe.description: Clean the entire safe including the safe body, door, button, and knob.

cleanse_safe_body.description: Cleanse the body of the safe to remove any unwanted particles.

sanitize_button.description: Sanitize the button to ensure hygiene.

sanitize_knob.description: Sanitize the knob for hygiene purposes.

polish_whole_safe.description: Polish the entire body of the safe, to maintain it, including the safe body, door, button, and knob.

clean_safe.description: Clean the entire safe including all components.

basic_function.description: Open the safe, turn the knob, press the button, and then close the safe.
